sentences.en: "State-owned industries will always perform poorly," John Moore informed readers.
sentences.cn: “国有企业经营不善将是常态，”约翰·穆尔告诉读者。

sentences.en: Fund managers are poorly placed to monitor firms.
sentences.cn: 基金管理人不适合监管公司。

sentences.en: He entertains his guest very poorly.
I've just phoned Julie and she's still poorly.
sentences.cn: 我刚给朱莉打了电话，她身体还是不舒服。

sentences.en: If the patient is poorly nourished, the drugs make them feel nauseous.
sentences.cn: 如果患者进食欠佳，药物会让他们感觉作呕。
马特的妻子身体一直不好。

sentences.en: She was born prematurely with poorly developed lungs.
sentences.cn: 她早产,肺部未发育健全.

sentences.en: Some are living in poorly built dormitories, even in tents.
sentences.cn: 有些人住在建筑质量很差的宿舍里，甚至帐篷里。

sentences.en: The army is very poorly equipped.
The dishes were many, but they were all poorly cooked.
sentences.cn: 菜很多, 但烧得都不好吃.

sentences.en: The onions bulbed poorly in this cold wet season.
sentences.cn: 洋葱在这个冷湿季节中鳞茎长得很不好.

sentences.en: The patient was but poorly able to sit up.
The poorly designed bridge needs remedial work to make It'safe.
sentences.cn: 这座设计拙劣的桥需要做补救工作,以确保它的安全.

sentences.en: They were dressed and fed poorly.
sentences.cn: 他们的衣食状况都很糟糕。

words.tran_cn: 贫穷的；可怜的；贫乏的；卑鄙的
身体不舒服的；心情恶劣的
贫穷地；贫乏地；不充分地

trans.tran_en: If someone is poorly, they are ill

trans.tran_cn: 糟糕地，差劲地，身体欠佳地
